#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int height[512][512], visited[512][512], ans[512][512];

int main() {
	int N, M, a, b, flowing_out = 0, level;
	priority_queue<pair<int, int> > q;
	cin >> N >> M;
	for(int i = 0; i < N; i += 1)
		for(int j = 0; j < M; j += 1)
			cin >> height[i][j];
	cin >> a >> b;
	a -= 1, b -= 1;
	level = height[a][b];
	q.push(make_pair(-level, (a << 10) + b));
	while(!q.empty()) {
		int h = -q.top().first;
		int i = q.top().second >> 10, j = q.top().second & 1023;
		q.pop();
		if (h > level && flowing_out)
			break;
		else {
			level = max(h, level);
			ans[i][j] = 1;
			for(int x = -1; x <= 1; x += 1) {
				for(int y = -1; y <= 1; y += 1) {
					if (x || y) {
						int k = i + x, l = j + y;
						if (k < 0 || k >= N || l < 0 || l >= M)
							flowing_out = 1;
						else if (!visited[k][l]) {
							visited[k][l] = 1;
							q.push(make_pair(-height[k][l], (k << 10) + l));
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	for(int i = 0; i < N; i += 1) {
		for(int j = 0; j < M; j += 1)
			cout << ans[i][j] << " ";
		cout << endl;
	}
}
